Simple Craft is a cracked Minecraft Server - this means you can connect on a non-premium or premium account.
We are running on minecraft 1.6.2 !!
The PvP Server contains the following:
• HungerGames
•Mini Games
• Factions
• Residence
• McMMO
• Playerheads
• MobEconomy (Kill Mobs, Receive Money)
• Mob Arena
• Much more!
-Rules: No Hacking No Glitching Don't ask owners for items Don't ask for Staff Ranks Don't ask for "OP" No Exploit's No Racism No Advertising No Spamming No Sexism No Hatred No Scamming Respect Staff No Griefing No Raiding[/size]
